data.message:
EUZUBILLAHIMINEŞŞEYTANIRRACIM BISMILLAHIRRAHMANIRRAHIM
ALLAHU EKBERRRRR! LA İLAHE İLLALLAH MUHAMMEDEN RESULULLAH!...............!!!!.!!!

END TIMES hadith 
There comes a time, then the Muslims do today if I did that one-tenth of worship, is freed from the punishment of the Hereafter. Prophet Muhammad s.a.v. 
A time it commanded you that you are leaving one-tenth of the world would be destroyed. Then it will come a time when he commanded the self gets rid of that one-tenth of Muhammad pbuh
